fillInstructionsArray

public static void fillInstructionsArray(java.lang.String fileName)
Parameters:
fileName - This is the file location of the instruction table This function reads a specified instruction file we have formatted and it adds the data from the specified instruction file into the public static InstructionArray. This allows us to easily check to see if an instruction is in the correct format.

fillErrorArray

public static void fillErrorArray(java.lang.String fileName)
Parameters:
The - file location of the error table is passed to fill the error arraylist. This function reads a specified error file we have formatted and it adds the data from the specified instruction file into the public static ErrorArray. This allows us to easily check to see if an error is in the correct format.
